title: Clock size for the Always On Display
content:
When I navigate to:
Display, Advanced, Screen Saver, Clock, Digital/ Start Now
and click "Start Now"
I am shown a clock with a LARGE font.

However when the screen saver activates on its own, the time is only a MEDIUM font.
If music is playing, the time on the screen saver is shown as a SMALL font.

Why is the size different in each case?
If Google wants to give people a choice of the clock size, then give us a choice and use that size consistently. But changing the size in different situations is confusing. I prefer the largest size shown with the "start now" option.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
